languages.text: {n}Руки Джай изгибаются в прихотливом театральном жесте, словно она на сцене.{/n} "На Ифрите говорят, что чтобы знать будущее, надо обратить взгляд в прошлое, ибо Великий сплел время в петлю. Я слышала сказку... Прекрасную сказку об авантюристке и воровке, что украла у вселенной счастье и, словно спелый плод, вкушала его в одиночестве. Но разве можно быть счастливой в одиночестве? Нет. И тогда воровка разделила свой трофей с Вольным Торговцем, что был{mf||а} прекрас{mf|ен|на} и внешностью, и сердцем".

{n}Jae performs a whimsical flourish with her hands as if she is on stage.{/n} "On Efreet they say that if you want to know the future, you must turn your gaze to the past, for the Exalted One wove time in a loop. I heard a story... a wonderful story about an adventurer and thief — she stole happiness from the universe, and alone she enjoyed the sweetness of that ripe fruit. But can anyone be happy alone? They cannot. And so the thief shared her trophy with a Rogue Trader, whose beautiful face matched their beautiful heart."
languages.original_text: {n}Руки Джай изгибаются в прихотливом театральном жесте, словно она на сцене.{/n} "На Ифрите говорят, что чтобы знать будущее, надо обратить взгляд в прошлое, ибо Великий сплел время в петлю. Я слышала сказку... Прекрасную сказку об авантюристке и воровке, что украла у вселенной счастье и, словно спелый плод, вкушала его в одиночестве. Но разве можно быть счастливой в одиночестве? Нет. И тогда воровка разделила свой трофей с Вольным Торговцем, что был{mf||а} прекрас{mf|ен|на} и внешностью, и сердцем".

I heard a story... a wonderful story about an adventurer and thief — she stole happiness from the universe, and alone she enjoyed the sweetness of that ripe fruit. But can anyone be happy alone? They cannot. And so the thief shared her trophy with a Rogue Trader, whose beautiful face matched their beautiful heart."

languages.text: {n}婕伊用手做了个古怪的动作，仿佛在舞台上表演一般。{/n}“在艾弗里特，人们都说，如果你想预知未来，就必须把目光转向过去，因为至高无上的神皇将时间编织成了一个轮回。我听说过一个故事……一个美妙的故事，关于一个冒险者和一个小偷。那个小偷从宇宙中偷走了幸福，但真的有谁能独享幸福吗？没有。于是，那个小偷与一位行商浪人分享了她的战利品，那位行商浪人可爱的脸庞与美丽的心灵相得益彰。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae performs a whimsical flourish with her hands as if she is on stage.{/n} "On Efreet they say that if you want to know the future, you must turn your gaze to the past, for the Exalted One wove time in a loop. I heard a story... a wonderful story about an adventurer and thief — she stole happiness from the universe, and alone she enjoyed the sweetness of that ripe fruit. But can anyone be happy alone? They cannot. And so the thief shared her trophy with a Rogue Trader, whose beautiful face matched their beautiful heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊用手做了个古怪的动作，仿佛在舞台上表演一般。{/n}“在艾弗里特，人们都说，如果你想预知未来，就必须把目光转向过去，因为至高无上的神皇将时间编织成了一个轮回。我听说过一个故事……一个美妙的故事，关于一个冒险者和一个小偷。那个小偷从宇宙中偷走了幸福，但真的有谁能独享幸福吗？没有。于是，那个小偷与一位行商浪人分享了她的战利品，那位行商浪人可爱的脸庞与美丽的心灵相得益彰。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}まるで舞台の上にいるかのように、ジェイは両手でひらひらと手を振る。{/n}「イフリートでは、未来を知りたければ過去に目を向けるべきだと言われているんだ。エグザルテッド・ワンが時間を繰り返し紡いでいるから、と。あたしはある物語を聞いた…ある冒険家兼泥棒の素晴らしい物語をね…彼女は宇宙から幸福を盗み出し、一人でその熟した果実の甘さを楽しんだのさ。でも、一人で幸せになれる人がいると思う？そんなの不可能。そしてその泥棒は、美しい顔と美しい心を併せ持つ自由開拓者と戦利品を分かち合った」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae performs a whimsical flourish with her hands as if she is on stage.{/n} "On Efreet they say that if you want to know the future, you must turn your gaze to the past, for the Exalted One wove time in a loop. I heard a story... a wonderful story about an adventurer and thief — she stole happiness from the universe, and alone she enjoyed the sweetness of that ripe fruit. But can anyone be happy alone? They cannot. And so the thief shared her trophy with a Rogue Trader, whose beautiful face matched their beautiful heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}まるで舞台の上にいるかのように、ジェイは両手でひらひらと手を振る。{/n}「イフリートでは、未来を知りたければ過去に目を向けるべきだと言われているんだ。エグザルテッド・ワンが時間を繰り返し紡いでいるから、と。あたしはある物語を聞いた…ある冒険家兼泥棒の素晴らしい物語をね…彼女は宇宙から幸福を盗み出し、一人でその熟した果実の甘さを楽しんだのさ。でも、一人で幸せになれる人がいると思う？そんなの不可能。そしてその泥棒は、美しい顔と美しい心を併せ持つ自由開拓者と戦利品を分かち合った」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae gesticula ostentosamente con las manos como si estuviera en un escenario.{/n} «En Efreet dicen que para conocer el futuro hay que mirar al pasado, ya que el Exaltado hizo que el tiempo fuera un bucle. Conozco una historia... una historia maravillosa sobre una aventurera ladrona que robó la felicidad al universo. Disfrutaba a solas de la dulzura de ese fruto maduro pero, ¿es posible ser feliz estando sola? No. Y por eso la ladrona compartió su trofeo con un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente cuya belleza era comparable a la grandeza de su corazón».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae performs a whimsical flourish with her hands as if she is on stage.{/n} "On Efreet they say that if you want to know the future, you must turn your gaze to the past, for the Exalted One wove time in a loop. I heard a story... a wonderful story about an adventurer and thief — she stole happiness from the universe, and alone she enjoyed the sweetness of that ripe fruit. But can anyone be happy alone? They cannot. And so the thief shared her trophy with a Rogue Trader, whose beautiful face matched their beautiful heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae gesticula ostentosamente con las manos como si estuviera en un escenario.{/n} «En Efreet dicen que para conocer el futuro hay que mirar al pasado, ya que el Exaltado hizo que el tiempo fuera un bucle. Conozco una historia... una historia maravillosa sobre una aventurera ladrona que robó la felicidad al universo. Disfrutaba a solas de la dulzura de ese fruto maduro pero, ¿es posible ser feliz estando sola? No. Y por eso la ladrona compartió su trofeo con un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente cuya belleza era comparable a la grandeza de su corazón».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae fait un geste fantaisiste avec les mains, comme si elle dansait sur scène.{/n} « Sur Éfrit, on raconte que pour connaître l'avenir, il faut se tourner vers le passé, car l'Exalté tisse le temps en boucle. J'ai entendu une histoire... une histoire merveilleuse, celle d'une aventurière et voleuse qui avait dérobé le bonheur de l'univers pour profiter en solitaire de son doux fruit bien mûr. Mais peut-on vraiment être heureux quand on est seul ? La réponse est non, et ainsi donc, la voleuse décida de partager son trophée avec {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} au visage aussi beau que son cœur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae performs a whimsical flourish with her hands as if she is on stage.{/n} "On Efreet they say that if you want to know the future, you must turn your gaze to the past, for the Exalted One wove time in a loop. I heard a story... a wonderful story about an adventurer and thief — she stole happiness from the universe, and alone she enjoyed the sweetness of that ripe fruit. But can anyone be happy alone? They cannot. And so the thief shared her trophy with a Rogue Trader, whose beautiful face matched their beautiful heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae fait un geste fantaisiste avec les mains, comme si elle dansait sur scène.{/n} « Sur Éfrit, on raconte que pour connaître l'avenir, il faut se tourner vers le passé, car l'Exalté tisse le temps en boucle. J'ai entendu une histoire... une histoire merveilleuse, celle d'une aventurière et voleuse qui avait dérobé le bonheur de l'univers pour profiter en solitaire de son doux fruit bien mûr. Mais peut-on vraiment être heureux quand on est seul ? La réponse est non, et ainsi donc, la voleuse décida de partager son trophée avec {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} au visage aussi beau que son cœur. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae macht mit ihren Händen eine wunderliche Geste, so als ob sie auf einer Bühne stünde.{/n} "Auf Efreet heißt es, dass man seinen Blick in die Vergangenheit richten muss, wenn man etwas über die Zukunft erfahren will, da der Erhabene die Zeit zu einer Schleife verwoben hat. Ich kenne eine Geschichte ... eine wunderbare Geschichte über {mf|einen Abenteurer|eine Abenteurerin} und eine Diebin – sie raubte überall das Glück im Universum und genoss die Süße dieser reifen Frucht ganz alleine. Aber ist es möglich, alleine glücklich zu sein? Ist es nicht. Also teilte die Diebin ihre Trophäe mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin}, da {mf|sein|ihr} schönes Gesicht zu {mf|seinem|ihrem} schönen Herz passt."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae performs a whimsical flourish with her hands as if she is on stage.{/n} "On Efreet they say that if you want to know the future, you must turn your gaze to the past, for the Exalted One wove time in a loop. I heard a story... a wonderful story about an adventurer and thief — she stole happiness from the universe, and alone she enjoyed the sweetness of that ripe fruit. But can anyone be happy alone? They cannot. And so the thief shared her trophy with a Rogue Trader, whose beautiful face matched their beautiful heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae macht mit ihren Händen eine wunderliche Geste, so als ob sie auf einer Bühne stünde.{/n} "Auf Efreet heißt es, dass man seinen Blick in die Vergangenheit richten muss, wenn man etwas über die Zukunft erfahren will, da der Erhabene die Zeit zu einer Schleife verwoben hat. Ich kenne eine Geschichte ... eine wunderbare Geschichte über {mf|einen Abenteurer|eine Abenteurerin} und eine Diebin – sie raubte überall das Glück im Universum und genoss die Süße dieser reifen Frucht ganz alleine. Aber ist es möglich, alleine glücklich zu sein? Ist es nicht. Also teilte die Diebin ihre Trophäe mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin}, da {mf|sein|ihr} schönes Gesicht zu {mf|seinem|ihrem} schönen Herz passt."

languages.original_text: {n}Jae performs a whimsical flourish with her hands as if she is on stage.{/n} "On Efreet they say that if you want to know the future, you must turn your gaze to the past, for the Exalted One wove time in a loop. I heard a story... a wonderful story about an adventurer and thief — she stole happiness from the universe, and alone she enjoyed the sweetness of that ripe fruit. But can anyone be happy alone? They cannot. And so the thief shared her trophy with a Rogue Trader, whose beautiful face matched their beautiful heart."

languages.text: {n}Jae, sanki sahnedeymiş gibi elleriyle gösterişli bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "İfrit'te derler ki... Eğer geleceği bilmek istiyorsan bakışlarını geçmişe çevirmelisin. Görkemli, zamanı bir döngü şeklinde dokur. Bir hikâye duymuştum. Bir maceracı ve hırsızla ilgili harika bir hikâye. Kadın, evrenden mutluluğu çalmış ve o olgun meyvenin tadını kendi kendine çıkarmış. Peki ya insan kendi kendine mutlu olabilir mi? Olamaz. Bu yüzden de hırsız; ganimetini, yüzü de yüreği kadar güzel olan bir Hür Tacir'le paylaşmış."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae performs a whimsical flourish with her hands as if she is on stage.{/n} "On Efreet they say that if you want to know the future, you must turn your gaze to the past, for the Exalted One wove time in a loop. I heard a story... a wonderful story about an adventurer and thief — she stole happiness from the universe, and alone she enjoyed the sweetness of that ripe fruit. But can anyone be happy alone? They cannot. And so the thief shared her trophy with a Rogue Trader, whose beautiful face matched their beautiful heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae sanki sahnedeymiş gibi elleriyle gösterişli bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "İfrit'te derler ki; eğer geleceği bilmek istiyorsan, bakışlarını geçmişe çevirmelisin, Görkemli zamanı bir döngü şeklinde dokur. Bir hikâye duymuştum. Bir maceracı ve bir hırsız hakkında harika bir hikâye. Kadın evrenden mutluluğu çalmış ve o olgun meyvenin tadını kendi kendine çıkarmış. Ama bir insan kendi kendine mutlu olabilir mi? Olamaz. Bu yüzden de hırsız, ganimetini, yüzü de yüreği kadar güzel olan bir Hür Tacir'le paylaşmış."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
